explains: adj. 统治的；在位的；本届的；起支配作用的
v. 统治；支配；盛行；成为最佳（reign 的现在分词）
wordGroup: reigning world champion 卫冕世界冠军

sentences.en: "The ancient Hawaiians were astronomers," wrote Queen Liliuokalani, Hawaii's last reigning monarch, in 1897.
sentences.cn: 1897年，夏威夷最后一位在位君主利留卡拉尼女王写道：“古代夏威夷人是天文学家。”

sentences.en: The sky was dark, stars were twinkling high above, night was reigning, and everything was sunk in silken silence.
sentences.cn: 天很黑，星很繁，夜阑人静。

sentences.en: This is the reigning king of eBook readers for Windows, Mac, and Linux.
sentences.cn: 这个软件是当之无愧的电子书阅读软件王者，不论是在Windows，Mac还是Linux平台。
